licensePricing._comment_E3: Managers in Helse og Velferd + all other etater (Teknisk, IT, PPT, etc.) with laptop
licensePricing._comment_F1: Non-managers in Helse og Velferd on ThinOS (no laptop as primary device)

licenseOverlapRules.name: E3 + E5 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: E5 includes all E3 features - remove E3 to eliminate redundancy

licenseOverlapRules.name: E1 + E3 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: E3 includes all E1 features - remove E1 to eliminate redundancy

licenseOverlapRules.name: Exchange Online + E3 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Exchange Online Plan 1 is included in M365 E3

licenseOverlapRules.name: Exchange Online + E5 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Exchange Online Plan 1 is included in M365 E5

licenseOverlapRules.name: Intune + E3 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Intune is included in M365 E3 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: Intune + E5 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Intune is included in M365 E5 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: Entra ID P1 + E3 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Entra ID P1 is included in M365 E3 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: Entra ID P1 + E5 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Entra ID P1 is included in M365 E5 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: Entra ID P2 + E5 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Entra ID P2 is included in M365 E5 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: Entra ID P1 + P2 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Entra ID P2 includes all P1 features - remove P1

licenseOverlapRules.name: Power BI Pro + E5 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Power BI Pro is included in M365 E5 - standalone license is redundant

licenseOverlapRules.name: A1 + A3 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: A3 includes all A1 features - remove A1 to eliminate redundancy

licenseOverlapRules.name: A3 + A5 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: A5 includes all A3 features - remove A3 to eliminate redundancy

licenseOverlapRules.name: F1 + E3 (Role mismatch)
licenseOverlapRules.description: User has both F1 and E3 - Helse og Velferd: managers get E3, non-managers get F1

licenseOverlapRules.name: A5 Faculty + E3 (Dept mismatch)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Undervisning staff should have A5 only, not commercial E3

licenseOverlapRules.name: A5 Student + E3 (Dept mismatch)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Students should have A5 only, not commercial E3

licenseOverlapRules.name: A5 + F1 (Dept mismatch)
licenseOverlapRules.description: Undervisning staff should not have F1 frontline license

licenseOverlapRules.name: EMS E3 + E5 (Tier redundancy)
licenseOverlapRules.description: EMS E5 includes all EMS E3 features - remove EMS E3

licenseOverlapRules.name: EMS E3 + M365 E3 (Included in bundle)
licenseOverlapRules.description: EMS E3 components (Intune, Entra ID P1) are included in M365 E3
